import styled from 'styled-components' import { Event } from '../../pages/e/event.types' import BaseUser from '../user/User' import Comment from '../comment/Comment' const EventWrapper = styled.div` ` const TitleWrapper = styled.div` font-weight: bold; ` const BaseEvent = ({id, time, title, creator, guests, drinkType, location, comments }: Event) => ( {title}
id: {id}
time: {time}
Created by: {creator}
at: {location.name} ({location.latitude}, {location.longitude})
what are we drinking: {drinkType}
Guests:
{guests.length > 0 ? guests.map((guest) => ( )) :
No guests :(
} {comments.length > 0 && <>
Comments:
{comments.map((comment) => ( ))} } ) export default BaseEvent
